sources.title: The Boss (1956)
sources.description: Political c orruption is vividly depicted as a ruthless WWI veteran takes almost complete control of a state with the help of a crooked lawyer.

metadata.Plot: When Gabby has a wild one-night stand with a stranger, she's committed to leaving without a name or number. What she doesn't expect is to run into that same stranger the next morning - who just so happens to be her new boss. Or to...
metadata.Actors: Erica Gliksman, Christopher Lawrence, Natalie Nankervis
